Inglewood.Farmdale station:
Farmdale (formerly Cienega) is an at-grade light rail station in the Los Angeles County Metro Rail system, located at the intersection of Farmdale Avenue and Exposition Boulevard, in the West Adams District in Los Angeles. This station is served by the Expo Line.


== Service ==


=== Metro Rail service ===
Expo Line service hours are approximately from 4 AM to 12:30 AM daily.
